content.detailedDescription:
Sighting report:   something just flew over my damn house! i was
 outside on the porch with my son when an orb like object passed
 over my home. it was only there for a split second, but it was
 no damn plane. i am a deeply religous man, but what i saw today
 has no explanation. it was not a standard aircraft, it was
 almost circular with 4 or 5 lights, bright lights, the craft
 blended in with the dark sky, but those lights, they stuck out
 like sore thumbs. a couple of them were blinking if i remember
 correctly. it was big from what i saw, about the size of a
 commercial airliner. it was pretty low down, and as i said
 before it was there for only a second. it caught my eyes and i
 thought it was a plane or what not, but that thing was not
 human. i always laughed at those cooks on tv who reported ufo
 sightings, but i saw this with my own eyes. it seemed to just
 float above me for a split second then it was gone. i really
 wish i could explain it, i m sure there is some sort of
 explanation. i just know that i have never seen anything like
 it. i am a grown 45 year old man with 2 kids and a wife, i can
 vouche that my mind is stable. my 12 year old son saw it too and
 he recommended that i tell the news about it. i tried calling
 the local news but they pretty much called me a qwack and hung
 up on me. i know you are a respectable news agency and that
 hopefully you will believe my story. this whole fiasco happened
 about half an hour ago. hopefully you get other reports or can
 confirm that it s just some sort of new air craft, but i am sure
 that what i saw was not human. it is cloudless outside, so i m
 sure it wasn t that. it happened around 7:45 to be exact, march
 19th.

Sighting report:   i m not sure what exactly i just saw. i was
 driving home from a friends house, maybe 20 minutes ago, about
 9:30 est. i was stuck in traffic and i looked into the sky
 above. in the sky, coming fast from the west was a strange
 sight. it looked like 4 craft in the air, unlike anything i d
 seen before. they flew in a formation, but it was easy to see 4
 distinct shapes. the had lights on them. 2 of the lights were
 flashing multicolored, the other 2 were bright white. as they
 made there  way across the sky, i heard a sound that went like
 "loooooooo" it doesn t seem like anything of a human convention,
 but it might be some military thing. i am vetry shook up now
 though, so i decided to report thjis in, in case it is something
 more.

-jamal bradford
miami fl

Sighting report:   hello.

i feel i have something important to share with you. i used to be a
doubter of these u.F.O. s of science fiction, but that is no longer
true. at about 7:31 today, i saw an amazing thing in the sky. i saw
some sort of craft, with four lights. it had four lights. one light
was blue, the other yellow. the other two lights seem to be blinking
multiple colors. the craft was flying northeast at great speed. it
took less than five seconds for it to go from one side of the horizen
to the other. it made a hi-pitched sound as it went across the sky.
something that sounded like "looooooooooo". this was definitely no
airplane like i have ever seen.

thank you
anne lopez
Sighting report:   i saw a craft with several blinking lights on it last night. looked very suspicious. i am certain it wasn t just a plane because it did not fly like a plane would.

Sighting report:   i was playing with my little brother outside
 and we heard a loud "looooooooooloooooooooolooooooooo" sound
 above us.  it was headed south.  we looked up and 4 lights
 zoomed past us going very fast.  i ve already called local news
 stations, but this can t hurt.  please believe me, it was a
 scary sight.

Sighting report:   on wednesday, may 18 at about 12:30 a.M., i
observed a greenish blue light off the east side state highway 43
north of interstate 12 near albany, la. the light appeared low on
the horizon an traveled in an easterly direction at a high rate of
speed until disapearing behind a stand of pine trees. the object
looked to be like a glowing orb of light very spherical and it is
hard to determine the size because i do not know the distance it was
from me. i only saw it briefly the one time although; i parked near
to the sighting and looked for several minutes to see if it would
reappear. it did not reappear and i gave up the vigil after a few
minutes. i found out about mufon after photographing scott arnett,
an investigator for louisiana and mississippi, for a newspaper
article.

Sighting report:   sighting by april tipton field investigator for
mufon of kentucky.

sighting took place june 14,2005 at aprx 10:10pm lasted about 2
minutes. temp was about 68 degress. atmospheric conditions were
partly cloudy.  i had stepped outside to my car, when i looking
southward i noticed a brightly lit object that appeared to be
hovering above my nieghbors house, i then saw that it was moving,
but very slowly due north.  i did at first think that this was a
conventional aircraft, but upon taking note of how large and low
flying it appeared to be realized that this was something out of the
ordinary. the objects altitude was no more that 1000ft. the object
was very large and at least several hundred feet long and at least
200-300ft across. it appeared to be light from within. color was
yellow and orange and appeared to pulsing, as it went over top of me
i noticed that there was no sound at all and the object appeared to
more cylindrical than round. i came back into the house to retrive
my video camera and when i came back out noticed that the object was
still there. i began to film the object and did so until the object
was out of sight.  i then went to review the footage and noticed
that upon doing do that the camera had been subject to some sort of
interference.  the footage before the event was fine and i made a
recording after and it to was also just fine. i then contacted the
local airport and was put in contact with air traffic control who
said that there was nothing at the altitude at the time of the
sighting and was told in fact nothing was on the radar at the time.
also was told that the only aircraft who would have been in the area
would have our 2 life flight helicopters.  i then proceeded to
contanct the local police department to see if anyone had contacted
them about this and was told that they had recieved no other calls.
call with any questions

Sighting report:   i was outside on nov 13, 2003. it was my cousins
birthday. i looked up and saw a red light just in the sky. it wasnt
moving, then it blinked and disappered. it then appeared to the far
west of the sky. i was facing portsmouth ohio. it was about 930pm. i
also saw what apperard to be a shooting star soon afterwards.

Sighting report:    on sunday morning, april 10, 2005 around  5:50
am i went out side and was going to the car when i looked up and
there was  circular object in the sky overhead .It was a strong  
orange color. it never moved while i stared  at it. i live in a
trailer park and the size of it covered the well over the width  of
the road. i stared at it for a short time .It was lower than most
aircraft that fly overhead.No planes i ever saw could stay
motionless  in the air. it was not the moon. because it was just
slighly over the trailers in the trailer park.It made me wonder what
it was.,i went inside  after about several  minutes of staring at
it. all that time it never  moved.It had a color orange all around
it.. it was a perfect circle. it was very low in the sky. to low for
comfort.

Sighting report:   i was outside letting my dogs out when i heard
 a low whirring sound.  i looked up and saw 4 lights, 2 of which
 were changing colors.  i was scared and told my parents.  they
 told me to report it to you guys so i came in here to do so. 
 this all took place at 9:07 pm est today, march 19, 2005.  it
 was a little cloudy, but there were breaks in the clouds which
 allowed me to see this. after i saw this small detail, it flew
 quickly west.

Sighting report:   it was march 17, 2005 at @7:00 p.M. i was
 driving home from work and traveling west on westheimer. i was
 @1/4 mile from the intersection of highway 6. at this
 intersetion is a mall called west oaks mall. looking above and
 beyond the mall i saw some lights. one in particular was bright
 and and also had a blinking light. it seemed to stay in one spot
 and then it moved a little. this is what initially caught my
 attention. then, all of a sudden, i saw a black triangular
 object which was in the same vicinity but on the side of the
 blinking craft that i was on. this black triangular craft or ufo
 was many, many times bigger than this other blinking craft.
 also, i began to notice a lot of other brightly lit craft with
 blinking lights. i believe that these were either planes and or
 helicopters. it occurred to me that these lit up and blinking
 craft (probably planes and or helicopters were possibly trying
 to observe this black triangular craft). the black triangular
 craft was moving towards the direction of traffic that i was
 caught up in trying to get home. it was moving slowly but
 steadily towards my direction. i kept thinking i must be seeing
 things and continually tried to open my eyes larger to make sure
 i was seeing clearly. this triangular object seemed to
 intentionally move right above the low lying clouds. the clouds
 were thin enough to be able to clearly see the dark triangle
 shape of the object. the rest of the sky was clear. it was in a
 perfect form of a triangle and all sides were equal in size.
 there were no lights and i heard no noise. the craft eventually
 went past my car. this, i believe, was about 3-5 minutes in
 total. i was on my cell phone talking to a close friend during
 this entire event. i told her that i had to turn my car back in
 the other direction so that i could find a parking lot to park
 my car and get out and continue to observe this object. she
 decided to get off the phone with me. i turned my car around and
 found a parking lot. by the time i got out, it had become darker
 and i was no longer able to see the object. i was amazed and
 frustrated at how quickly it got darker. i reported this to the
 harris county sheriff s department and asked them who i could
 call to report this other than them. they told me that there
 were some life flight helicopters doing practice landings in
 that area. i assured them that this was in no way a helicopter
 that i was calling them to report. due to the response that they
 gave me, i have to wonder if they had already gotten reports
 similar to mine. i also wonder if in fact the helicopters that i
 was seeing were really practicing life flight landings or if
 this was simply what they were telling people. it may be that
 they really were practicing and the triangular object was a
 separate event. maybe the triangular object was observing the
 helicopters practicing life flight landings or maybe not. we
 will probably never know. i did notice that after the triangular
 object was out of my sight, there were many other crafts within
 a 5 mile radius (as i traveled home) flying around the area. one
 in particular seemed to be circling close to the path of the
 triangular object. my goal was to find out if anyone else saw
 this same triangular object in this area and around the same
 time. i was given the number of nasa but decided that i didn t
 trust contacting the government. i just learned about your site
 and hope that someone will contact me to investigate this
 further and will also let me know if there have been any other
 reports on this.

Sighting report:   it was in 2001,march,on a clear
night,approximately 11.30,i and a fellow worker were in the
guardhouse at reilly chemical company, talking.I stepped outside
while my friend sat down in his chair,and i started to get in the
company vehicle, which was still running, when a soft popping sound
caught my attention. looking up, there hovering above the truck was
a elongated shape resembling a football. i called out to chuck to
come outside for a minute, as i wanted someone other than myself to
see it. chuck stopped in the doorway and his jaw dropped. i slowly
stepped to the truck directly under the object.Looking up at it i
could see what appeared to be lines [very faint,i should point out]
going both vertically and horizontally around the object. it was lit
up with a soft glow that seemed to iminate from inside of it, almost
like a soft white light bulb. there were no visible markings on it.
i did notice that for something that big and bright it seemed to
cast no shadow on the ground or the truck. after what seemed to be
four or five minutes, it began to move slowly in a southerly
direction, following high tension wires in the plant.It was
completely quiet and made no noise as it moved.Chuck and i watched
as it slowly made its way south [through a 45 acre site]untill it
vanished suddenly.I might add that i have since retired from my job
and am on disability. i have a lot of questions that i would like
for someone to answer for me.I have been in the army security
agency, spent eight years as a special deputy for the county of
marion, state of indiana, and have flown on numerous planes. nowhere
have i ever seen such a craft, either before or since.

Sighting report:   it was march 21 at 9:00p.M.I seen three redish
lights to the north of clinton county that was very high in the sky
and from my experince i beleive that they were jets or airplanes
they lasted about ten to fifteen seconds and then they faded away it
was very weird. not falling stars my friend also seen them we were
both weided out by them it was when we were parking my car to go
into his house. when i did a search on mufon and seen that the
family by kirklin indiana had seen somthing similar that they called
orange lights and checked with airports to reveal that there wasnt
suposed to be anything in the sky i thought i would let you know
that i had seen those three lights also but what i saw were red ones
we seen them on the north side of frankfort and it looked like they
were in carol county not clinton. they were far away.At least that
is where they appered to be. very stange

Sighting report:   i was sitting in my backyard saturday
night,4/16/05, when i noticed a bright orange light in the northwest
sky. the sky was mostly clear with a half moon in the western sky. i
initialy thought it was a commercial aircraft. the light then split
into two lights. again, i thought it to be a plane in a pattern.
however, the lidht then split to three then four and finaly six
seprate lights, same orange color, same intensity. this was observed
by five other witnesess. they looked like a strind of bright orange
pearls. this lasted approximitley ten seconds. at that point, the
lights merged into one source, and then vanished. i am a e.R. nurse
with twenty five years experience and have good assesment skills.
this was like nothing i have ever seen. it did remind me of the
accounts of the phoenix lights witnesses. regards, mike cluggish

Sighting report:   last night , april 8, 2005 around midnight i
 went out to our balcony(we live in a 6th floor apartment, it was
 very clear, quiet & no wind. something caught my eye at about
 a"10 o clock" angle, it was a perfect rectangle shape, but
 nothing else was visible. at first i thought it was one of those
 white styrofoam planes but just a wing, except it wasn t windy.
 then i realized it was all white light, moving much faster than
 a plane, making no sound. it stayed on a straight course, but
 the scariest part was the way it changed angles. staying on a
 straight course this rectangle would randomly (and very quickly)
 change angles. first left then right, then right again so it was
 going backwards!  very deliberate and quick movements, stopping
 at a different angle each time, this still disturbs me because i
 know a plane cannot make these quick moves, let alone fly
 sideways or backwards. in a matter of  about 10 seconds it was
 moving so fast that it disappeared into cloudless night sky. but
 not towards the horizon like a plane would do, it almost
 appeared to go up a bit as it disappeared! i have no idea how
 high it was, it seemed like about the altitude of a small plane,
 but if it was that high it must be the length of a football
 field. i would love to know if anyone else saw this. please let
 me know, thank you.
-kier

Sighting report:   5/10/05  i know what aircraft sound like.But
this was not like
iv heard before. i t whas 11;12 a.M it s sound was like that
of a humming bird & a helicopter. there were no navigation
lites whatsoever. time lapse was aprox. 3.Min i don,t know
what i t was but i f you know what it might be please conact
me.

Sighting report:   our family lives in a rural setting in extreme
southeast iowa.  we live on top of a bluff about 10 miles west of
the mississippi river.  between the hours of 12:30 a.M. and 4:00
a.M. approximately 30 degrees from the earth s surface in the
horizon there has been for the last 6-8 weeks and as of this date
4/13/05 what appears to be a star. significantly brighter than the
other stars around it. this "star" moves and changes colors with a
particular pattern of movement.  it will hover for a few minutes
then it will travel straight up and then move to the right and
back to the left in a triangular pattern.  at the same time
patterns of light are changing from red to green appearing amber
most of the time. when it changes direction and moves it turns
bright green and then when it stops it dims and then becomes
luminous back to amber and then green.  on occasion there have
been more than one.  to see them in the sky and to measure is so
difficult.  the brightest one has been seen "flashing" and another
"star" will be approximately "3 feet" to the right" when the
brightest star flashes the other will be luminous in green and red
and on occasion blue. it s as though they are communicating to
each other in some way.  the dimmer one will hover and then move
the left and then to the right and go back to the top in it s own
triangular pattern. the brightest one will "brighten up" and
travel to the right and then left and back to the top. i d guess
that over the last 14 days there has only been one night when it
wasn t visible to us.  i have wondered about national security
practices in our air space. for example,  we have hi-tech
warplanes and they are practicing maneuvers or something.  but
like clockwork in a rural area say within a 75 mile radius evey
night?  we have obviously been trying to rule out the theory of a
ufo.  but, we are beginning to accept,  understand and believe the
theory and possibility of ufos. afterall, what are small town
hicks with lots of country, farm fields and timeber with the
mighty mississipi going to do about them?!!
coincidentally, where the patriot missles are built is our large
ammunition plant that built nuclear weapons in the 1970s is within
30 miles of where we live.

Sighting report:   it came around at 9:23 pm. it was oval like and silver. it was around 1000 ft in diameter and sped off going east. it caused lights to flicker and electronic equipment to mess up and sometimes turn off.
content.summary: It was oval like and silver. it was around 1000 ft in diameter and sped off going east.

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting report:   i went out side for a cigarette and i noticed a bright light (brighter then anything other star in the sky) flashing pinkish red, white and teal green in the sky.
it took under a second for the colours to change from red to white to green.
i watched the object for about 5 minutes, it occasionally moved side to side
and at one point i saw a small whiteish ball come off then merge back into the 
flashing object. it appeared to stay in the same location so i went in side to grab the binoculars. when i came back the object had moved further away in a southern direction.

i looked at it through my binoculars and it appeared to have a slight haze around it 
whereas the other stars i looked at in the sky did not. at this point it appeared to 
be moving side to side and up and down, but when i looked at it though my binoculars
it appeared to be somewhat still. at this point i was lying on the ground trying to stabilize my binoculars.

i moved out of site of the object for about 30 seconds and by the time i returned the object was gone.

the object was sighted in the west not far above the horizon.
i attempted to take some photos with my phones digital camera (sharp gx-15)
they show the objects location in the sky.

Sighting report:   4 lights, 2 blinked several colors, the other two were white. no distinct shape. about 6:10 pm hawaii time. slowly hovered past a nearby mountain before speeding off. emmitted a "looooooooooo" sound

Sighting report:   i was in the us air force, stationed at
 shreveport la. in the early 1950"s.  i was a gunnery sgt, on a
 b-29.  we flew many training missions up and down the east
 coast, on several occasions, something would follow our course,
 it appeared to be a big light glow. but it seemed to have
 control. we, the crew members would follow and discuss the
 appearences,  i asked our pilot on one occasion, a major, if he
 would make a  report, his response, "if i made a report i would
 not get another promotion"  he was a carrier officer.  i was
 living off base, we had an early morning training mission, had
 to be at the base at 6:30 am., as i left the house i saw a
 flying object that was not one of ours. i looked up and saw this
 flying object, coming toward my direction, it was at about 1000
 feet altitude, completely silent, cigar shaped, about as long as
 a foot ball field, port holes every 10 or 15 feet, it came in
 slow and silent, when it was almosst overhead, it turned,
 pointed it s nose slightly up and flew off in the direction of
 the air base and vanished.  i got into my car, went to the base,
 and checked with the guard at the expermintal hanger. told him i
 wanted to have a look inside, i reached for the door handle, and
 he said, "sarge. if you open that door,i will blow the s--it out
 of you" he was serious, i then told him i saw something in the
 air and said i wanted to know if we had anything like that in
 our hanger" his eyes got as big as silver dollars and he said he
 saw it also. i asked him to describe what he had seen,  he
 described the exact same object that i had seen.

Sighting report:   i was outside with my friends at about 9:30.
 it was dark, and a bit cold. we were outside and we heard this
 noise, this "loooooooo" sound. we looked up and there were a
 couple of lights in the sky, blue green and purple lights. they
 were changing color and wiggling a bit. after a minute or two,
 all of the sudden the craft? came down really fast. without any
 noise or wind, the lights just got much further apart and much
 bigger. then suddenly, it flew off to the right, really fast.

Sighting report:   i saw the ufo at around 9:35 pm est on march
 19.  the ufo was oval-shaped with 4 lights.  2 of them were
 white and the other 2 changed from blue to green as it flew over
 me. it seemed to be moving very fast and it made a
 "looooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo" sound.

Sighting report:   sunday, june 12, 2005, app. 6:30 pm.  the
dewpoints were high because ts arlene had just come through the area
and the enormous cumulo-nimbus clouds were moving slowly due north,
following arlene s remaining center.  there were huge breaks of sky
and i often watch as passenger jets come into the area from the
northeast on their way to hartsfield airport.  i can sometimes make
out the logos on their tails as they are relatively low at that
point of their final approach.  on this afternoon, i was watching
what seemed to be a 737 or airbus coming over and then, suddenly i
saw an object moving lower than the plane (but not much lower)
directly from due east to  north of east.  it made a wide swath as
it turned.  it was black but appeared metallic as it reflected the
sun.  it almost looked like a huge chair!  wierd!  it did not seem
to be a balloon as it appeared to move of its own accord and not
float.  this object appeared to be very large, maybe as big as a
house.  the crew of the plane must have seen it as they flew by it
and over it on their approach to atlanta airport. i know that they
must have seen it.  please let me know if there were any reports of
anything odd on sunday around 6:30 - 6:45pm by any jet crews
approaching atl!  i am very sure that i saw something very odd.  as
it moved away to the north, it disappeared into the clouds.  i
estimate that it was 1,000 feet high.  thank you.
content.summary: Black, small chair- or tophat-shaped object in sky lower than commercial jet, made wide-slow-smooth arc

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting report:   i was playing basketball at my local court,
 when i heard a looooooo sound and i saw something out of the
 corner of my eye. i looked over and saw a small  craft  going
 through the sky at a reasonable speed. there were 4 lights. 2 of
 them were blinking several colors rapidly. this occured around
 8:40 pm the night of 3/19/05. it was brief, and the skies were
 clear. it went in a straight line and disappeared over some
 trees, out of my sight.

Sighting report:   this could take a while...My sighting started
 at 7:30pm 1/16/05 and lasted until 11pm as i drove south on hwy.
 301 from jacksonville, fl.  as i drove s on 301 i eventually
 noticed an object in the sky sw of me far away and hovering. 
 one small red light on each side - distance was impossible to
 guess due to darkness and the small size of the lights, but they
 were maybe 2 finger-widths apart from each other at that time. 
 in the direct center of them at about 1 second intervals a white
 light blinked.  alternately, above each red light (solidly lit
 at all times) a very small and fast white light would flash
 after the center white light would flash.  as i drove towards
 ocala, fl on 301 this "hovering" object neither deviated in
 altitude nor moved from side to side...Also, it never became
 smaller or dimmer indicating that it was moving farther from me
 as i drove and i was unable to catch up to it...Basically, it
 became very conspicuous to me due to this because that meant to
 me that it was going the same speed as me and never varied. 
 twice i stopped at gas stations on 301 to get a drink or hit the
 bathroom.  each time i basically forgot about the object until i
 got back into my truck and back onto the highway.  both times
 this object was still in the exact location of the sky and
 neither looking closer or further away from me, yet as i again
 would drive towards it at 70mph it still seemed to stay exactly
 the same distance from me no matter what.
by now i m very much unsure that this could be a plane,
 helicopter or blimp...The lights just weren t right, plus it s
 odd way of staying in the same place all that time whether i was
 moving or not just seemed impossible and very improbable for a
 typical aircraft.  then a second one appeared in the sky just
 down and to the w of the first one...Hovering in the same way. 
 i say appeared because it didn t fly to that position but just
 appeared or turned it s lights on...Same configuration of two
 solid reds, center white blinker and two blinking whites above
 the reds. 
these two objects stayed this way until i turned w on i think hwy
 40 north of ocala to head to i-75.  then instead of viewing them
 high up out of my windshield i had to look out my side window
 and up.  not long after turning w the object that had appeared
 second very noticeably began to move w away from the first
 object, still hovering.  it seemed to be heading sw as it was
 definitely get smaller in size and much dimmer after a while,
 but the rate of it s movement was very slow and deliberate in a
 straight direction and i was able to view it for a very long
 time even when it was apparent that it was many many miles s of
 me.
at the i-75 intersection i again stopped at a gas station.  when
 i came back out 5 minutes later the first object was still
 hovering and the second though still visible was definitely much
 farther to the sw but i could still see it s red lights and
 blinking whites.
as i turned s on i-75 still watching these two objects i finally
 decided that i needed to tell someone about this because i just
 didn t believe now that these were typical aircraft.  so i
 called my girlfriend and described to her everything i d seen
 and thought up to that point asking her not to think i was
 crazy.
i could still easily see the stationary object blinking away, and
 i could still see the one that had flown sw away from me.  at
 this point things went absolutely crazy and unbelievable and i
 kept my girlfriend on the phone as i described every event to
 her and i was completely shocked to be seeing what i was
 seeing...The next events happened almost directly over i-75 and
 also over the fields to either side e and w and all over the sky
 s of me as i drove s on i-75...And they happened for over an
 hour straight:
a very large, bright white object appeared in the sky to the se
 of me on the e side of i-75...Kind of far from the original
 object...However that object now began to move w and fly
 directly over i-75 out over the fields...Still in some way
 looking the same size and brightness even though i was traveling
 at 65 mph towards it the whole time...Very wierd.  at first i
 was thinking the new object was a planet or star...Very large
 and bright white and not moving at all even though i was heading
 for it, which is was what made it seem like a star.  as i
 described to my girlfriend the red lighted object flying left to
 right in front of me, directly over the highway in the darkness
 straight to my s a very small white object blinked...Then
 blinked again but easily 2 hand widths to the right...Not being
 sure if it was the same object or a second blinking object at
 that time all of a sudden multiple white blinking objects  (i
 think maybe from 3 to 6 or so) began blinking all over in a
 group form right over i-75.  they weren t bright...Small star
 type brightness and flashing very fast then maybe off for a
 second or so...But there were definitely more than 2 since i
 could see a group of them moving around flashing and then i
 guess appearing in other locations in the general area of the
 sky, so either very fast moving and in quick turns of direction
 or several of them...It was just hard to tell also due to
 oncoming headlights and also the intervals of very tall street
 lights messing w/ my eyes...Plus it wasn t easy keeping my eyes
 on all this as well as the large semi-trucks and other vehicles
 that i was trying not to swerve into...I was pretty excited at
 this point and describing it all to my g/f at the same time.
it appeared after a couple minutes that i did travel underneath
 the location of the fast blinkers and i couldn t see them
 anymore...During all of this i could now still see the constant
 hovering large white light plus now three of the red lighted
 objects moving back and forth to the s and se and sw of
 me...Moving in different directions very slowly and deliberately
 and not making any turns.
one of these flew towards the large white light, and around this
 point my g/f said that i should just pull over but i didn t want
 to...About 1 minute later i passed a pick up on the shoulder of
 the hwy. and the driver was standing next to his truck staring
 up at the sky...It definitely looked like he was witnessing what
 i was...I just don t see how anyone could have missed the red
 objects, but the fast blinkers were very elusive unless you were
 paying attention as i had been.
at this time the large white object began to move from e to w
 over i-75 (this was after the one red lighted object flew over
 near it s vicinity).  this really got me excited because now i
 knew it wasn t a star...It moved slowly and deliberately from
 left to right over the hwy to over the farm field area that
 borders the hwy.  at this point that white object most obviously
 turned due n to parallel the hwy. though off to my w. it then
 also decreased altitude so rapidly and sped so quickly towards
 me that the diameter of the light easily doubled in size and
 intesity...It actually shocked the shit out of me and i started
 yelling into the phone, i mean it almost looked like it rocketed
 down and towards me...It was amazing.  at that point i said
 screw it and hit the shoulder of the hwy and slammed on the
 breaks.  unfortunately i stopped next to a small grove of pine
 trees blocking the view....But...And this is where i began to
 believe i wasn t seeing normal aircraft...This bright object had
 slowed down very slowly again...The very bright half moon that
 was out last night was above the object...The bright white light
 then dimmed almost off and at that time i could then see three
 tiny green lights in a slim triangular shape as if i was seeing
 the bottom of the craft at just a slight angle as if it wasn t
 quite perfectly horizontal and maybe angeling away from my point
 of view just enough to see underneath it.  even better...Due to
 the large bright white light going so dim and the slight
 illumination of the three green lights at the points of the
 triangle, i could easily make out the edges of the object
 connecting the green lights as a triangle...I saw this shape for
 about 1 second before the white light in the center turned on
 super bright like a beaming spot light towards me so that all i
 could see was a large white ball again and it was descending to
 the ground going behind the tree line i was parked at.  or else
 it turned more w away from me making it look as if descending,
 but it was going lower in the sky either way and through the
 trees i could see it s bright light very easily.  i m conviced
 this was a triangular shaped object just as i ve always heard
 described on tv...I couldn t believe my eyes and was still
 describing this to my disbelief over the phone.
the wind was hard that night and temps were probably 40 or less,
 so after this 5 or so minutes of exposure i had to jump back in
 my truck.  all this time there were still 2 or three red lighted
 objects either hovering or flying randomly in the sky to the s
 still.  i saw one tilt itself to a 45 degree angle as it hovered
 also and then go back horizontally.
i finally got back on the hwy still watching the red objects and
 about 200 yards down the road the trees ended and everything
 openned up to a vast farm field...I could still see many objects
 out there so i pulled over again.  and again the sky went nuts
 with activity.  at one point i could easily count up to 6 red
 light objects flying in different directions from n to s and e
 to w and back again as i looked to the w towards the field. 
 some flew at angles directly over me but it was impossible to
 tell their altitude or size...My hunch though was that they
 didn t seem much larger than a commuter plane...Cesna sized or
 something.  the triangle object was somewhat easier to tell it s
 distance from me at that point when the bright light dimmed
 allowing me to make out it s edges, and i bet it was not much
 farther than 1 or 1.5 miles...And since the lights seemed fairly
 close together i d guess each side was maybe 40/50 feet or so???
  maybe something like that.  anyway, back to the field
 action...
along w/ all the red light objects directly to the w of me i saw
 so many fast blinking white lights zooming all over the place in
 a group...Again it was just a crazy show.  they reminded me of
 when you can see a satellite fly over...That general size of
 light, like small star sized and the same whitish-blue color. 
 only they flashed very quickly and then seemed to re-appear very
 quickly in another location...Hard to guess how many due to
 their speed and randomness, but they were definitely out there
 blinking all over.  while all that was going on almost directly
 above me a red-lighted object appeared right up above me...Very
 bright in color, so it seemed kinda low and larger since the red
 lights were definitely farther apart on this object...Maybe not
 even a mile up, but i couldn t tell of it s shape like i could
 the triangle.  i don t know if it just materialized in that
 location or if it s lights were out and then just turned on, but
 it just appeared and then started to fly in a straight line to
 the se of me...These things were everywhere and some would fly
 away to the s but then some would fly in from the n and they
 would criss-cross the hwy.  i can t believe people weren t
 seeing this, but i just don t know if they would notice it as
 odd like i did since i d been watching them for so long by this
 point.  i think this second stop on the hwy lasted about 20
 minutes watching all kinds of activity...I was freezing and
 shivering almost uncontrolably by then, but refused to get back
 in my truck for risk of missing even more activity or something
 more spectacular.  but the fast blinkers seemd to disappear
 eventually, and the red-light objects decreased down to like 2
 and were again hovering to the s of me.  so i got back in my
 truck and started s again.
i ll tell you that by this point as exciting as it had been it
 started to get a little boring and even my g/f was ready to get
 off the phone with me and my descriptions...She just didn t want
 me to wreck my truck (i almost did several times though).  so i
 hung up with her.  i eventually didn t see anymore objects in
 the sky and was getting to around 40 miles or so from tampa on
 i-75.  i was still in somewhat of shock or disbelief over all of
 this and decided to call one of my best friends to tell him all
 about it...I knew he wouldn t think i was lying or crazy.
as i neared finishing my story of everything that happened one of
 the red-light objects appeared again very low and just to the sw
 of me on the freeway...Just out of no where and bam there it
 was, and this was while my friend was still on the phone.  you
 could tell it was moving slightly to the w and then it began to
 roll into a 45 degree angle to the right and then it rolled back
 to horizontal and then to about 45 degrees angle to the left as
 it slowly flew w away from me.  i was able to watch it fly very
 low to the w until it disappeared from view.
these things just weren t planes or helicopters...I was able to
 view them for such a long time that i m convinced they weren t
 airplanes, blimps or helicopters.  my main confusion is just
 that if these were secret government craft then why the hell fly
 them over a freeway with lights flashing and not in the desert
 of nevada.  and if these were alien craft why the hell have all
 those lights on and be seen???  and also is there anyway to find
 out if they showed up on radar???  i didn t see any news of this
 today on the net or tv or radio, so i don t know what to think.
i was even kinda ready to not think they were ufo s up until that
 freakin  white ball zoomed like it did and then showed itself as
 a triangle for that second or so...That blew my mind to see a
 triangle after hearing about them on tv all these years...This
 was the most bizarre thing i ve ever witnessed, and as i
 searched tonight i found this link and decided to try and write
 it all down to you.  that s the whole story though...Even though
 so much of it is like burned into my mind and i can still
 visualize what i saw and the sequence of events i still think i
 left some out because there was just so much activity going on
 at once for such a long time.  sure wish i d had a video or
 something.
that s it though.  i m going to copy what i ve written to you and
 post it on other sites if i find any worthy ones.  maybe someone
 else who saw those things last night will stumble across my
 story and corroborate it.  let me know if you have any
 questions.  thank you.  ian curran, 33, tampa, fl

Sighting report:   i was paintballing in a forest on june 6 it was a
clear night at somewhat 2200hrs with some friends when my squad and
i heard a loud buzz ne of my buddies wisperedto lok at my left i
look at him and his eyes wer fixed on some thing  i looked and i saw
a tall thin gray humanoid with eyes as wide as dinner plates and a
large elongated head i tapped the second man in my squad to call the
attention of the rest of the squad i gave hand signals to open fire
on my command i couldnt think of any thing else to do i waited at
least 5 seconds before yelling open fire and we sprayed it with
paintballs it turned only to meet at least 50 rounds to its face and
hundreds more to the rest of its body we stopped when we wasted our
ammunition to my surprise it was still standing and then dropped but
i thought we killed it we carefully stepped toward it guns locked
loaded and leveled met the opposing squad who wanted to know what we
were shooting at i nudgedit with the barrel of my assault rifle
(ariakon sim4 with a m16a2 barrel attachment)all of the sudden it
disintegrated into a bluish mist ever since i have been seeing a
strange orange ball of light over that area

Sighting report:   although this occurred in early 1990, i have
never told anyone this tale, nor have i ever heard one like it. my
then wife and i were on the lake worth fishing pier, when we saw a
round beach ball sized craft approach from the north, about 50 feet
offshore, at about 100 feet, and disappered southbound. it make no
noise. generated no air waves, and we both looked at each other and
said, did you see that." we both did, and as far as i know, we never
spoke of this to anyone. i am a former newspaper reporter, tv
correspondent, and am a  florida licensed private investigator. it
was truly, the strangest event in my lifetime. george lamothe

content.summary: Couple saw white light moving quicky

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting report:   this happend in september of 96,i know its been a
while but i thought you would like to know ,i was coming back north
on us 27 in lakeplacid this ball of light came up over a state
trooper station right at me then backed up and stayed right along
side of me on the side of the south bound lanesit stayed with me for
about 3 miles then it took off i could still see it it went so far
away and came back in my guess about 5 seconds then it was only
about 2 miles from me it was shooting red and blue beems of light to
the ground then it drifed away ,when it was along side of me it was
so bright but did not lumanate anything and had tear drop shaped
lights swirling all around inside the white light they were rainbow
colored ,it was about the size of two full size vans ,and there was
no noise,it looked like it was pulling in energy and the lights
inside were gathering up what ever it was pulling in thats my theory
any way,the distance between us was about 75 to 100 ft.I wish i had
a camera that night and all the other times thank you .
